title: why dont people hit the nexus?????
body:
just lost a game were we were 1 nexus hitting shy away from victory, 4 out of 5 of the enemies were down, adc,  ivern jg and lb were still alive in the enemy base, ivern and lb trying desperate to destroy the nexus with their little auto attacks (god bless their souls for trying) and our caitlyn? decides farming super minions while standing right next to the nexus was a better idea instead, enemy team responded, killed my team, rushed down to our base and eneded the game

G
G. 

why is that not a reportable 0 tolerance offense? because it really needs to be.
